title: Ravishing Ruby & Diamond Gold Kangan (Bracelet)
materials: Round Cut Diamonds (1.96 carats total). High-luster Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A sleek and modern take on the traditional Kangan, featuring eight pear-shaped rubies and twenty-four round-cut diamonds prong-set along a 22K gold band. The alternating ruby and diamond design creates a striking visual rhythm. The streamlined design is perfect for the modern South Indian woman.
occasions: weddings or as a gift for a loved one
description: This elegant Kangan seamlessly blends traditional Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship, it's a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. A valuable investment piece for your jewelry collection.
